game_description: Features: - Cross-platform! VR and Flat players can play together. - Server browser: Find a game quickly from any platform! - Positional VOIP: hear the fugitives whispering in the bushes as you search for them. - Watch the Replay: At the end of the round talk with everyone about how close they were to catching you as you all watch a replay over the round! - Free and Open Source! - Even runs on Android phones, so your one lame friend with no VR and no PC can still join in on the fun :P
review_1: It doesn’t work it was just a black screen fix it now or I find you and I will kill you
review_2: Please fix. It seems like so much fun! I wanted to play with my brothers since they don't have vr but now I cant. Please please please fix!
review_3: But I have hope that your game will be working soon
